dashboard.title: Farm Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor your farm conditions and weather at a glance

weather.title: Weather Center
weather.subtitle: Accurate agricultural weather information and forecasts

crops.title: Crop Management
crops.subtitle: Monitor and manage your crop conditions

chat.title: AI Agricultural Consultation
chat.subtitle: Get expert agricultural advice from AI
chat.includeCropType: Include your crop type and growth stage
chat.mentionLocation: Mention your location for weather-specific advice
chat.describeSymptoms: Describe symptoms clearly for pest/disease diagnosis
chat.useSpecializedTabs: Each tab provides specialized advice for that topic

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.subtitle: Systematically manage your agricultural knowledge and information
knowledge.storeImportant: Create your first knowledge entry to store important farming information, research findings, and agricultural insights
knowledge.noMatch: No knowledge entries match your search
knowledge.selectType: Select the type of agricultural knowledge you want to document
knowledge.provideBasic: Provide basic information about your knowledge entry
knowledge.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Best practices for maize cultivation in Northern Tanzania
knowledge.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this knowledge entry will cover...
knowledge.addSourcesAfter: You can add sources and start conversations after creating the entry
knowledge.tipsTitle: Tips for creating effective knowledge entries
knowledge.tip1: Use descriptive titles that clearly indicate the topic
knowledge.tip2: Upload relevant documents, PDFs, or web links as sources
knowledge.tip3: Ask the AI assistant questions to explore the topic deeply
knowledge.tip4: Organize related information under appropriate categories
knowledge.tip5: Update entries as you learn new information

knowledgeEntry.documentsReferences: Documents and references for this knowledge entry
knowledgeEntry.noDescription: No description available for this knowledge entry
